musicalFriends.text: I first met Dan when I got involved with the Charlatans back in 1965.

musicalFriends.text: Finding Chris was a lucky break for me.

musicalFriends.name: Norman Greenbaum
musicalFriends.text: I met Normie at open mic night at the Troubadour in Hollywood.

musicalFriends.text: One day Rita Abrams, a pretty gal I had previously met socially,

musicalFriends.name: Brian Elliot
musicalFriends.text: A guy walked into my office on Kearny Street, claiming to be a songwriter.

musicalFriends.text: In '64 I was looking for artists to sing on my embarrassing and ill-fated

musicalFriends.name: Jim Wilsey
musicalFriends.text: Jimmy was playing with Chris in the band Silvertone when I first met him.

musicalFriends.text: I’m not sure how I first met Nick Urbanik, who later took the stage name

musicalFriends.text: A guy called me from Mississippi and asked if I’d listen to his group.

musicalFriends.name: Kevin Mooney
musicalFriends.text: Kevin was an intense little man that came by my office in the mid-70s.

musicalFriends.name: Cass Elliot
musicalFriends.text: Cass was a big, beautiful gal, sunny and funny with a wonderful voice.
